pli-tv-bu-pm:0.2: The Theravada Monks’ Code of Rules
pli-tv-bu-pm:1.2: these are called “preparations” for the Uposatha.
pli-tv-bu-pm:2.1: Consent, purity, telling the season, counting the monks, and the exhortation:
pli-tv-bu-pm:2.2: these are called the “preliminary duties” for the Uposatha.
pli-tv-bu-pm:3.1: The Uposatha has arrived; all monks in the stated boundary are present;
pli-tv-bu-pm:3.3: no legally indicted monk is present: these are called “factors of readiness”.
pli-tv-bu-pm:4.1: Having completed the preparations and the preliminary duties, with the agreement of the assembled monks who have confessed any offences, I invite the commencement of the recitation of the code of conduct.
